Pronouns (ex).general_note: Pronouns a declined in their own ways
Pronouns (ex).genitive_note:
neho | -ňho | -ň is used with prepositions.
Neho is a separate word | -ňho | ň are suffixes.
Pronouns (ex).dative_note:
nemu | mu is used with prepositions.
Neho | ho are equal.
Pronouns (ex).accusative_note:
neho | ho | -ňho | -ň is used with prepositions.
Neho | ho are separate words | -ňho | ň are suffixes.
The form neho | -ňho is for living | ho | -ň if for non-living.
Pronouns (ex).genitive_context: Ona išla od ___ do domu.
Pronouns (ex).dative_context: Ona davala niečo ___?
